fullText: Brian Friel's 1980 play about the clash between Irish and English cultures in 19th-century Ireland receives a respectful but somewhat static revival in this Manhattan Theatre Club production.
dtliExcerpt: Brian Friel's 1980 play about the clash between Irish and English cultures in 19th-century Ireland receives a respectful but somewhat static revival in this Manhattan Theatre Club production.
